channel.title: Port forwarding
channel.description:
Alright , im at port forwarding and i have a problem.
Protocol : TCP
Port range : 43594 to 43594
Translate to : ?
Trigger protocol : TCP
Trigger Port : ?
I need help where the ? - s are.
A game or application is made of one or more TCP/UDP port ranges. Each incoming port range can be translated into a different internal (local network) port range. Port ranges can be statically assigned to devices or dynamically assigned using an outgoing trigger.
Please help me , what should i enter to Translate to and trigger port ?

item.title: Port forwarding
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

What are your options?

If its a manually entered #, i would leave it blank. Trigger port might be 43594?

Read full topic
